entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ListView` uses the wrong style in WinUI 3 #6209
  • Windows Desktop App fails to run in administrator mode #6208
  • [Android] Setting the background color on entry changes the underline color as well #6207
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Line (horizontal or vertical) does not show #6204
  • [iOS] Properly fix RenderAs for Windows #6203
    6.0.300
  • dotnet-bot image doesn't load on Windows unpackaged app #6202
  • Binding an Item's height and width to another item's height and Width in XAML causes exceptions and unexpected behaviors #6200
  • Toolbar moves when overflow button is pressed #6199
  • Partial Classes in Platform Folders Causing Ambiguity Errors #6198
  • How to use Razor Component Library with .Net MAUI #6194
  • Fix shell `gotoasync` so that the task resolves after navigation has finished on tabs/flyout #6193
    6.0.300-servicing
  • GroupBox component #6190
    Future
  • EF Core migration does not work for IOS #6189
  • Ping in iOS #6187
  • [Android] Changing the style dynamically leaves the colors from the previous style #6183
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI templates don't show in VS 2022 Preview #6181

Closed

  • bad grid layout in a stack #5344
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Sample app crashes on iOS 12 #6147
  • [Shell] [WinUI] TitleView always shows ShellContent title, even if it's set. #6148
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell Absolute Navigation Crashes when a title view is set to each shell page. #5944
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not work for transformed elements #4613
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] [iOS] Reads "empty list" after last button #3731
    6.0.300
  • Release event is fired twice when hit a button #6095
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Label Formattedtext setting textcolor sets backgroundcolor too #6129
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Negative Padding values fail on Windows work on Android #6182
  • The path 'XXXXXXX\Shared\MainLayout.razor.css' would result in a file outside of the app bundle and cannot be used. #4061
  • CSS Hot Reload for Blazor Hybrid #5751
    6.0.300
  • Hot Reload on MAUI Blazor App does not works. #2527
    6.0.300
  • MAUI project fails to build after changing ApplicationDisplayVersion #6188
  • Crash while trying to to register sync root with the OS in Windows #6136
  • Update Picker modal using DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged. #5557
  • System.MissingMethodException: 'No parameterless constructor defined for type' calling MVVM from Shell in C# #6180
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting iOS from Windows #4921
    6.0.300
  • Grid Column Layout Is Incorrect #5657
    6.0.300-rc.2

    area/layout 🔲

  • Fix TitleView swapping behavior on Android/WinUI #6195
    6.0.300-rc.2

  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
